Parameters.value: The parameters of the Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure. The default is an empty collection.

CommandBehavior.summary: One of the values, indicating options for statement execution and data retrieval.

CreateParameter.summary: Creates a new instance of a object.

CanCreateParameter.summary: Returns whether the method is implemented.
